title: Alexa+ goes free for all US users as Amazon expands AI push
description: If you're an Amazon Prime subscriber, you already have access to the paid version of the AI-powered digital assistant.

title: Monster.com founder Jeff Taylor returns to job-market business, with AI
description: Taylor's new company, Boomband, is starting with New England employers and job seekers, but aims to go nationwide by the end of the year.

title: As AI improves, real-time deepfakes pose growing risks
description: Deepfake technology is becoming more convincing — and more dangerous — as artificial intelligence improves.
